effects.name: Drop Dead (Ally)
effects.description: You appear to fall down dead. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Your illusory corpse remains where it fell, complete with a believable fatal wound. This illusion looks and feels like a dead body. If you use hostile actions, the spell ends. This ends the entire spell, so the illusory corpse disappears too.
